feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence metadata mapping features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing RollingCounter and WheelPicker components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup with extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes and wraps the app with theming, state providers, and sound effects.
frontend/src/assets/generated.ts: Exports paths to autogenerated image assets.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing background, content outlet, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestorePan: UI for exporting and importing JSON backups with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with icons, active highlighting, SFX, and haptics.
Sheet component displaying detailed daily stats including sessions and tags.
frontend/src/components/EnergyOrb.tsx: Canvas-based animated energy orb visualizing progress percentage.
frontend/src/components/FatigueRing.tsx: Canvas ring showing fatigue score with gradient and numeric display.
frontend/src/components/FrostedBackgroun: Animated blurred gradient canvas background reacting to window size.
Draws an animated 365‑day line graph on a canvas and notifies which day was clicked.
frontend/src/components/MetricCard.tsx: Displays a styled card showing a metric value, title, optional icon, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/RankBadge.tsx: Renders a decorative rank badge with optional particle effects and size variants.
frontend/src/components/RankPromotionOve: Shows a full‑screen rank‑up animation with sound, haptics, and auto‑dismiss.
frontend/src/components/RecordCelebratio: Displays a temporary full‑screen celebration for achieving a new record with sound and haptic feedback.
Provides a confirmation dialog to permanently reset all stored user data.
frontend/src/components/RollingCounter.t: Animates numeric value changes using an easing function for smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/SessionBuilder.t: UI for selecting sets, reps, weight, and duration to build a session and return the result.
frontend/src/components/StickmanVolumeCo: Interactive draggable stickman that adjusts sound effect volume with haptic feedback.
frontend/src/components/StreakFlame.tsx: Draws an animated flame whose intensity scales with the user’s streak count.
frontend/src/components/TagMultiSelect.t: Allows selecting and toggling predefined tags displayed as badges.
frontend/src/components/WheelPicker.tsx: Implements a draggable, inertial scrolling number picker with snapping and sound effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePullupStore.tsx: Manages pull‑up sessions and user settings using IndexedDB, exposed through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating all data access is handled offline via usePullupStore.
frontend/src/hooks/useRankProgress.ts: Computes lifetime reps, current rank, next rank, and progress, with promotion detection logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.tsx: Provides sound‑effect playback and volume management synced with IndexedDB settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, custom utilities, and component styles for the app UI.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Calculates fatigue and consistency scores from recent pull‑up session data.
frontend/src/lib/animations.ts: Exports reusable motion animation presets such as pulse, fade‑in, and blur transitions.
frontend/src/lib/backup.ts: Handles exporting and importing app data backups via IndexedDB.
frontend/src/lib/haptics.ts: Defines vibration patterns and triggers haptic feedback using the Vibrations API.
frontend/src/lib/offlineDb.ts: Implements an IndexedDB wrapper for storing sessions and settings plus backup import/export.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedTags.ts: Defines a list of preset tags for labeling pull‑up sessions.
frontend/src/lib/ranks.ts: Provides rank definitions and helpers for determining rank, next rank, and progress based on total reps.
frontend/src/lib/reset.ts: Clears all offline data and reloads the app.
frontend/src/lib/sfx.ts: Loads and manages sound effects, offering play and volume control utilities.
frontend/src/lib/stats.ts: Computes daily stats, streaks, totals, averages, and personal records from pull‑up sessions.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for sessions, stats, settings, ranks, streaks, and records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/AnalyticsScreen.tsx: Displays analytics including rank, streaks, records, fatigue, and consistency metrics.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows daily totals, rank progress, streak, fatigue, and goal progress with interactive effects.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Displays 365‑day history stats, weekly/monthly summaries, personal records, and a detailed day sheet using stored pull-up sessions.
frontend/src/screens/LogScreen.tsx: Handles building and tagging workout sessions, saving them, checking rank promotions, and triggering PR celebrations.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides controls for volume, daily goal, backup/restore, and data reset, including a wheel picker for goal adjustment.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s project state, requirements, architecture notes, image assets, and existing feature metadata.
